isDefault.description: A billing engine marked as default (only one can be default) is the billing engine new subscriptions will be created for, given no billing engine is explicitly mentioned in the payload. Currently immutable - once set, it can't be changed.

createdAt.description: The time operational data was created

updatedAt.description: The time operational was recently updated

subscribedOrganizationsToHandle.description: Organizations affected by the role removal

serviceDefinitionLink.description: Service definition reflink for the deleted role

prevLink.description: Relative path to previous page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

nextLink.description: Relative path to next page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

totalResults.description: Total amount of results if available

accessState.description: Type of access org has for the service

isFundMandatory.description: If true and the invited user's org has no fund, the fund of the user will be associated with the org. Default value is true.

isTosPreSigned.description: If true, the redeemer of this invitation will not have to sign TOS during onboarding process.

targetInstanceUrl.description: Target instance url to create service instance after invitation redeem.

customScope.description: (Optional) custom default role to be assigned to members of the organization when redeeming the invitation. This can be used to represent custom service resources or entities (for example: service tenantId) and follow the form of "<resource>:<permission>".

numberOfInvitationsToGenerate.description: The number of invitations to generate. If not supplied, one invitation will be generated.

context.description: The context passed to the service upon fulfillment request

isHidden.description: Specify whether this service role is hidden

isDefault.description: Specify whether this is the default service role

trialEndDate.description: Set trial end date or null for perpetual trial (required only for EXTEND_TRIAL action). Provide ISO date time string.

assignedInstance.description: Service instance assigned to principal org

productIdentifier.description: The product identifier in the Billing Provider

campaignId.description: The marketing campaign ID for the service

subscriptionLifecycleEventHandlers.description: Event handlers used during subscription lifecycle events

trialDetails.description: Service trial details for principal org

supportedBillingEngines.description: The billing engines supported by the service

isBeta.description: Determine whether the service is beta or not. Default: false

healthCheckURL.description: The health check relative url of the service

serviceType.description: Define the access type for this service, default value is PAID

isGated.description: Specify whether the service could be accessed using an invitation

serviceNavBarIcon.description: The service nav bar icon URL

serviceUrls.description: Service urls to be used by CSP

visible.description: Specify whether the service could be seen in CSP portal

svg.description: The icon in svg string or base64 string

trialEnd.description: Optional field to set end date for org with access to service

prevLink.description: Relative path to previous page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

nextLink.description: Relative path to next page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

totalResults.description: Total amount of results if available

productIdentifier.description: The product identifier in the Billing Provider

isPrimary.description: Determine whether the service is primary for its product

isGated.description: Determine whether the service is gated or not

isBeta.description: Determine whether the service is beta or not

campaignId.description: Marketing Campaign ID for the service

sellers.description: Allowed sellers - this *replaces* the current allowed sellers

trialPeriod.description: Set default trial period in days.

visible.description: Determine whether the service is visible or not

serviceSvgIcon.description: The service SVG icon string. UI will prefer this icon over others

supportedBillingEngines.description: Supported billing engines - this *replaces* the current supported billing engines

serviceNavBarIcon.description: The service nav bar icon URL

orgIdsToRemove.description: Organization ids to remove from the specified service instance

orgIdsToAdd.description: Organization ids to assign to the specified service instance

prevLink.description: Relative path to previous page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

nextLink.description: Relative path to next page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

totalResults.description: Total amount of results if available

prevLink.description: Relative path to previous page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

nextLink.description: Relative path to next page if exists. Not returned for POST requests

totalResults.description: Total amount of results if available

OrgServiceAccessResponse.description: Access state of the Organization to the Service

accessState.description: Type of access the Organization has for the Service

isDefault.description: Specify whether this is the default service role

orgId.description: The org UUID that will gain access to the service
